186009732.review: No es ni el mejor MMO ni el mejor Dragon ball, pero es un juegazo hecho y derecho, con contenido para dar y tomar. Por no hablar de los DLCs, que es verdad que superan los 100€ todos juntos, pero el juego no se resiente mucho sin ellos, y lo mejor de todo es que 9 años después de su lanzamiento (a fecha de este comentario) siguen sacando actualizaciones y contenido gratuito (y de pago, pero no es el tema). Por lo que para mi, es un juego que mínimo hay que probar si te gustan los MMO o los juegos de Dragon Ball. Ademas, es el único juego junto a Infinite World que tiene a Vegeta GT, que más podríamos pedir?

186004964.review:
Xenoverse 2 is a weird case for me when it comes to writing a review. I and much of the game's community agrees that the game could do a lot better when it comes to story, customization and RPG elements, as well as having pretty lackluster side-content, events and DLC's.

...But you can make your own DBZ OC and make them stronger.

Isn't that awesome?.. That's kind of the only appeal though. I really wish we got something like this more RPG/MMO feeling, with more customization options and a deeper move pool and min maxxing potential when it comes to races, gear and stats.

This is kind of like a weird-feeling budokai that isn't really budokai, and once you finish the main story with your guy you just kind of don't care anymore.. but the time before that point is pretty fun!

185999415.review: Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 es un juego muy entretenido que mejora muchos aspectos del primer título. El lobby es enorme y está lleno de cosas para hacer, y el modo multijugador sigue vivo, ofreciendo una gran variedad de combos y habilidades especiales. En cuanto a la historia, te sumerges literalmente en los capítulos de la serie. Además, le tengo mucho aprecio a este juego porque fue un regalo. :)

185994721.review:
Despues de 70 horas jugando DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2
 
Puedo decir que este juego es ideal para el aficionado de Dragon Ball como para el que no.
De una manera acotada te introduce a la saga como a la misma historia del juego que atraviesa la
historia de la saga Dragon Ball.
Si buscas una aventura casual en la cual disfrutar de una buena historia, buenos personajes y desafios
este juego es absolutamente para vos.
Y si por lo tanto buscas una historia larga, rebuscada y metaforica, este no es el lugar.

9/10 Como fanatico de la saga fue de los mejores juegos de DRAGON BALL que he jugado, tanto como el cariño que
tiene la desarrolladora detras del juego por la comunidad, como las actualizaciones, eventos y constante mejora del juego desde su salida me deja fascinado y encantado con este juego.
Sin embargo siento que falta cierta dificultad en la historia base del juego, seria un 10/10 si tuviera un modo DIFICIL ademas del modo NORMAL y FACIL al elegir las Patrullas del tiempo como las Misiones secundarias.

185204689.review:
The reason for my debt, a friend of mine convinced me that this game it's absolutely worth the price but since I was in vacation during the game's sale, I got pressured and asked him to buy it for me and in exchange I would pay him back 3 folds, did I pay him? not yet, almost a year passed and I'm still trying to get money since my employer didn't pay me for sh*t because I was a "trainee" therefore I don't need minimum wage(apparently)

Anyhoo, back to the game, it's mid ngl, the character customisation is ok, really a shame you can't choose height and breast size properly, I really wanted to be a short Majin, talking of which, the male one are an atrocity against God and men, breaking the bounds of the heaven with it sheer disgust, why MUST I be a fat Majin if I choose male and a sexy Majin if I choose female, I hate that, especially considering the sheer variation in the anime and how the female "Majin" was actually an android, not an actual Majin so it doesn't make sense

Combat system it's ok, i hope they add modern transformation although I doubt, things like Orange Piccolo and Beast Mode would both be absolutely cool, and maybe a chance to be an android? and having a chance to become Black Frieza and Ultra Ego Saiyan

overall a 6/10, just mid, not really much else to say, play it if you're a fan of the franchise or Dragon Ball in general, if you're looking for something cool just play Sparkling Zero or Warrior Z, both are cool and don't have character customisation, which is honestly better than shit customisation

184856397.review:
really fun combat.... boring story, way to much meaningless banter... stopped following the story pretty early on in the game.. Overall I really like the gameplay mechanics, and the visuals are great too... apart from the story this game makes one SUPER FRUSTRATING MISTAKE that's rediculously common: When you retry a fight the game shows you the cinematics all over again... Now you can skip these, which helps a bit, but sometimes there's like 3 or 4 consecutive cinematics and you wait for the game to load each one only to skip it.... so Waiting, skip, waiting, skip, waiting, skip, waiting, skip..... ok can I fight now??????? Just load the fight when selecting retry please... seems like an easy thing to fix, or just not design poorly, but this game is not alone with these issues. It amazes me games are still made that do this..

ok with that frustration out of the way (clearly i keep failing on one particular battle) I do very much like and recommend the game for anyone who wants a good dragonball universe battle experience with lots of cool customization options both visual and build options.

184855495.review:
Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 is a fantastic addition to the beloved Dragon Ball franchise. The game offers an immersive experience with its stunning visuals, solid gameplay mechanics, and a wealth of content that keeps players engaged for hours. The character customization options are deep and allow players to create their own unique fighters, while the story mode takes them on an exciting journey through the Dragon Ball universe.

The combat system is fast-paced and satisfying, capturing the chaotic and dynamic battles that fans of the series love. With a variety of special abilities and combo mechanics, players can experiment with different playstyles and strategies. The inclusion of iconic characters and memorable moments from the anime adds to the nostalgic appeal of the game.

Overall, Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 is a must-play for any Dragon Ball fan, offering a fun and engaging experience that stays true to the spirit of the original series.

184801728.review:
La trama: eres el becario de la Patrulla del Tiempo y tu trabajo es arreglar las metidas de pata en la historia. ¿Cell absorbiendo a Krilin? ¿Freezer aliándose con Yamcha? Aquí todo es posible y tu misión es gritarle al universo que "¡así no era!".

Lo mejor es que puedes recrear momentos épicos del anime... solo para ser apaleado por Raditz porque te quedaste mirando las animaciones (o porque tu conexión a internet decidió convertirse en Mr. Satán).

¿El multijugador? Perfecto para descubrir que ese chico de 12 años con un personaje llamado "GokutoSupremeX9000" puede eliminarte en 3 golpes.

En resumen: una mezcla de nostalgia, caos y momentos gloriosos. ¿Es perfecto? No. ¿Es divertido? Absolutamente. 9/10, volvería a salvar el tiempo mientras Goku toma siestas."

184563473.review:
Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 is an extraordinary experience where time-traveling dinosaurs teach you how to properly fold your laundry. The game’s graphics look like spaghetti, and the combat system is an intricate dance between 47 different types of bread. One moment, you’re charging up a Kamehameha wave while riding a cloud made entirely of pickles, and the next, you’re having a heated argument with a talking refrigerator about the meaning of life.

The story, however, is a masterpiece. Who needs coherent plotlines when you can collect invisible frogs and throw them into black holes? The music is a fusion of Beethoven and cowbells, creating a harmonious atmosphere that makes you question everything, especially the existence of socks.

Character customization is a deep philosophical debate on the morality of wearing mismatched shoes, and the online mode is like being in a room full of people who communicate exclusively through interpretive dance.

Overall, Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 is the perfect game for anyone who loves both high-speed combat and the sensation of being trapped in an endless dream involving pancakes and karate chops. Would I recommend it? Only if you’re interested in discovering what happens when you put a blender, a rubber duck, and a Super Saiyan in a room together.

184174897.review:
This isn't just an Arena Fighter, it's an MMO, an Action RPG, a Dating Sim, whatever the Hero Colosseum is, and an absolute Grindfest, but this has to be my favorite Dragon Ball game of all time.
Is it the best? Nah, not at all, like I said this game is an insane Grindfest and will easily eat hours of your life, but if you can stomach the grind you'll find something quite special.
Some of the most satisfying movement I've ever experienced in an arena fighter too, it feels a bit stiff once you start but after learning how to Ki Cancel everything just starts to make sense.

184001444.review:
O jogo é realmente muito melhor que o primeiro Xenoverse. O personagem do primeiro jogo (caso você tenha jogado na steam) é transferível como um herói lendário que salvou a história, e faz parte da narrativa do 2. É bem legal! Só não acho que as DLC's valham a pena, sinceramente. A não ser que a sua ideia seja jogar bastante do multiplayer, porque dão vários golpes bons. Acho que a edição base do jogo é suficiente para o singleplayer, no geral, espera uma promoção GRANDE da steam.

9/10.

183934703.review:
Points positif:

*Gameplay excellent.
*Contenue gigantesque et plus avec tout les DLC.
*Beaucoup de personnage et encore plus avec tout les DLC (138 personnages pour le moment + transformation pour les personnages qui le peuvent).
*Beaucoup de maps et encore plus avec les DLC.
*Très bon mode histoire.
*Création de son personnage avec beaucoup de possibilité de personnalisation que ça soit esthétique ou amélioration.
*Il y a encore du monde en multijoueurs 8 après ça sortie ça fait plaisir!

Points négatif:

*J'ai du cherchez sur internet beaucoup de chose que je ne comprenais pas ou qui sont caché, avec tout le contenue qu'il y a il est très facile de manquer des choses.
*Manque d'un écran scindé en multijoueurs local.

Conclusion:

Ma note est de 20/20 pour ce jeu sorti en Octobre 2016 et qui contenue en 2024 de sortir du contenu et continuera en 2025 normalement.
